node.title: The Last Five Kings of Judah
node.description: There’s a question that comes from long ago, and it’s very fitting for this week’s lesson: “If it rains on a rock, would that rock absorb water?” We’ll be reviewing the lives of the last five kings of Judah and finding out which kings were open to God’s leading and which weren’t, as well as discovering the important lessons we can learn from lives of ancient kings Join Pastor Chris Buttery as he walks us through some vital developments in the history of God’s people.
